segments.text: Hello . This is the front desk . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi . I ’ m calling from Room 209 . I couldn ’ t find the TV Guide . Can you send me one , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . There is one more thing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The mini bar door was open when I checked in . I didn ’ t use it . Could you send someone to check it out ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We ’ ll send someone right up . But don ’ t worry about that . Maybe the service person forgot to do it .
segments.speaker: S1
